column4: My networking seems to go 'kaput' after a couple of hours of use.  I will be working along and BAM, everything stops, I can't access the internet, I can't tunnel through my VPN, I can't ping anything for 'destination host unreachable', etc.  Restarting my comp fixes it and my workmates have no trouble keeping connected to the internet.  Any ideas?
does the entire computer freeze, or just networking?
